id: DPDPA Rules/Intimation of Personal Data Breach
title: Rule 7: Intimation of Personal Data Breach
description: When a personal data breach occurs, timing and transparency are everything. Rule 7 of the Draft Rules requires that both the Data Protection Board of India and the affected individuals must be informed without delay.
source: @site/docs/2. DPDPA Rules/07 - Intimation of Personal Data Breach.md
